name: Ancient God King's Coin
description: Increases ATK and Crit DMG by 20%.

story: During ancient times, God King Cain led the desert kingdom of Sekireinel to a golden age. This is a commemorative coin crafted from the gold he extracted from the desert. It holds mysterious power that makes one feel the sun's power and heat when held.
